Alex: Thank you for dealing with the delu Lizardman. I heard of your triumph from Leirynn. What's this, you found a Strange Map? Let me see it... Hmm... Dion territory... I can barely make out this name in the lower corner... 'Lambert'... Where have I heard that...? Oh yes... One of the Lord's royal guards had that name! I was under the impression that he absconded with Duke Ashton's Gold Bar during the farmer's revolt.
